text: A submerged pipeline that exploded and a fire on board a dredging vessel on Friday left 2 crew members dead and 2 others missing in Corpus Christi, Texas, the U.S. Coast Guard said. 6 people were hospitalized, with some being treated for burns. https://t.co/xOQJM45QAm

name: nytimes
text: Paintballs and pepper spray filled the air in front of the U.S. courthouse in Portland, Oregon, as pro-police demonstrators and Black Lives Matter supporters clashed on Saturday. Police officers watched from a distance and chose not to intervene. https://t.co/mWfV8G5WdS

text: Lebanon imposed a partial lockdown on Friday as coronavirus cases spike in the aftermath of the Beirut port explosion. The blast destroyed medical supplies, rendered 3 hospitals inoperable and damaged 2 that had been treating Covid-19 patients. https://t.co/hfL9EeJFMj https://t.co/jWcfoSL5nS
